Description: Stores high-level invoice details such as id (primary key), invoice_number (unique), gstin, vendor_name, invoice_date, and total_amount. Serves as the main reference for invoice_items and captures vendor billing information.

Stores individual line items of an invoice, including id (primary key), description_of_goods, quantity, weight, rate, amount, and invoice_id (foreign key referencing invoices.id). Used to record detailed breakdowns of each invoice.
